thread.title: TSB deploying a team of investigators to a marine accident in Tofino, British Columbia

author: cbs8
title: TSB deploying a team of investigators to a marine accident in Tofino, British Columbia
text:
Transportation Safety Board of Canada
RICHMOND, BC , Oct. 25, 2015 /CNW/ - The Transportation Safety Board of Canada (TSB) will be deploying a team of investigators to Tofino, British Columbia to investigate the sinking of the whale watching vessel Leviatan II. The TSB will assess the occurrence.
The TSB is an independent agency that advances transportation safety by investigating occurrences in the marine, pipeline, rail and air modes of transportation. It is not the function of the Board to assign fault or determine civil or criminal liability.
The TSB is online at www.bst-tsb.gc.ca . Keep up to date on the latest from the TSB through RSS , Twitter (@TSBCanada), YouTube and Flickr
